org.apache.river.test.impl.end2end.e2etest

Interface TestCoordinator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    End2EndTest

    public interface TestCoordinator
    Interface implemented by the object which drives the test

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int FAILURE
      exit code for a test failure detected
      static int SUCCESS
      exit code for successful test run
      static int TIMEOUT
      exit code for a timeout detected on a remote call

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void abortRun(int failureCode)
      Abort the current test run.
      InstanceCarrier getDefaultInstanceCarrier()
      The the default InstanceCarrier for the TestClient.
      Collection getTestClients()
      Gets the set of test clients which are running tests.
      Set getTests()
      Get the set of tests to run.
      int getThreadCount()
      Get the number of client threads being run

    • Field Detail

      • SUCCESS

        static final int SUCCESS
        exit code for successful test run
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • FAILURE

        static final int FAILURE
        exit code for a test failure detected
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • TIMEOUT

        static final int TIMEOUT
        exit code for a timeout detected on a remote call
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getThreadCount

        int getThreadCount()
        Get the number of client threads being run
        Returns:
        the number of client threads

      • getTestClients

        Collection getTestClients()
        Gets the set of test clients which are running tests. The number of elements in the collection should be the same as the value returned by getThreadCount
        Returns:
        the collection test clients created for this test run

      • getTests

        Set getTests()
        Get the set of tests to run. This is a set of Strings which may be test numbers or method names. If empty or null, all tests are to be run
        Returns:
        the collection of tests to run

      • abortRun

        void abortRun(int failureCode)
        Abort the current test run. This may be called at the end of a successful run to force an exit of the VM, or to prematurely terminate the run due to a failure or timeout.
        Parameters:
        failureCode - an integer value indicating the success/failure of the run.

      • getDefaultInstanceCarrier

        InstanceCarrier getDefaultInstanceCarrier()
        The the default InstanceCarrier for the TestClient. This is provided to support disabling the bridge, and is only meaningful for a single threaded run.
